devdoc.details: Extension of RefundableCrowdsale contract that only delivers the tokens once the crowdsale has closed and the goal met, preventing refunds to be issued to token holders.

buyTokens(address).details: low level token purchase ***DO NOT OVERRIDE*** This function has a non-reentrancy guard, so it shouldn't be called by another `nonReentrant` function.

claimRefund(address).details: Investors can claim refunds here if crowdsale is unsuccessful.

finalize().details: Must be called after crowdsale ends, to do some extra finalization work. Calls the contract's finalization function.

returns._0: true if the crowdsale is finalized, false otherwise.
minimum amount of funds to be raised in wei.

goalReached().details: Checks whether funding goal was reached.

hasClosed().details: Checks whether the period in which the crowdsale is open has already elapsed.

returns._0: true if the crowdsale is open, false otherwise.
the number of token units a buyer gets per wei.
the address where funds are collected.

withdrawTokens(address).details: Withdraw tokens only after crowdsale ends.

devdoc.title: RefundablePostDeliveryCrowdsale
